Validate Individual Catch Data

validate_catch.Rd

Compares each fish group catch (in catch_kg) to the upper bounds and flags values that exceed the bound. Values exceeding bounds are set to NA in the catch_kg column.

Usage

validate_catch(data = NULL, k = NULL, flag_value = NULL)

Arguments

data

A data frame containing columns: catch_id, gear, fish_category, catch_kg.

k

A numeric value passed to get_catch_bounds for outlier detection.

flag_value

A numeric value to use as the flag for catches exceeding the upper bound. Default is 4.

Value

A data frame with columns: submission_id, catch_id, catch_kg, and alert_catch.

On this page
